scripts.build:production: node generate-search-data.js && NODE_ENV=production eleventy && npm run optimize
scripts.optimize: npm run optimize:css && npm run optimize:html
scripts.test:smoke: source test-env/bin/activate && python -m pytest tests/ -v -m smoke
scripts.test:safari: source test-env/bin/activate && python -m pytest tests/test_ios_safari.py -v -m safari
scripts.test:mobile: source test-env/bin/activate && python -m pytest tests/test_ios_safari.py -v -m mobile
scripts.test:ios: source test-env/bin/activate && python -m pytest tests/test_ios_safari.py -v -m ios
scripts.test:setup: python3 -m venv test-env && source test-env/bin/activate && pip install -r tests/requirements.txt
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && npm run format:check
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:js -- --fix && npm run lint:css -- --fix && npm run format
scripts.analyze: npm run build:analyze && npm run logs:analyze
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run build && npm test
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules build-logs tmp
